data.title: Baruch de Spinoza
data.text:
Born: 24-Nov-1632

Birthplace: Amsterdam, Netherlands

Died: 21-Feb-1677

Location of death: The Hague, Netherlands

Cause of death: Tuberculosis

Remains: Buried, Nieuwe Kerk, The Hague, Netherlands

Gender: Male

Religion: Jewish

Race or Ethnicity: White

Occupation: Philosopher

Nationality: Netherlands

Executive summary: Rationalist, lensmaker

Father: Michael Espinosa (d. Mar-1654)

Mother: Hannah Deborah (d. Nov-1638)

Sister: Miriam (d. Sep-1651)

Sister: Rebekah (stepsister)

Brother: Isaac

Heresy

Excommunicated Amsterdam, Netherlands (27-Jul-1656)

Died Intestate

Portuguese Ancestry

Jewish Ancestry

Author of books:

Tractatus de intellectus emendatione (1661)

Renati Des Cartes Principia Philosophiae (1663)

Tractatus Tehologico-Politicus (1670)

Ethica (1677)

Tractatus de deo et homine etjusque felicitate (1852)

Do you know something we don't?

Submit a correction or make a comment about this profile
